When I was updating the firmware on them, my friend deployed code to the robot, which stopped the update. The two that finished updating appear just fine and look good on the REV client, but the other two did not finish updating. Now they won’t appear on the client and their lights won’t even turn on, despite it having power. Does anyone know anyways to potentially fix this
